snippet: Mr. Obama promised, yet again, to close the prison in Guantánamo Bay, Cuba. He has failed to keep that promise for five years.
abstract: Editorial welcomes Pres Obama's pledge to make good on his promise to close prison at Guantanamo Bay Naval Base, but criticizes him for not doing so earlier and for defending decision to force-feed inmates on hunger strike.
lead_paragraph: Mr. Obama promised, yet again, to close the prison in Guantánamo Bay, Cuba. He has failed to keep that promise for five years.

headline.seo: President Obama and the Hunger Strike at Guantánamo
headline.main: The President and the Hunger Strike
headline.print_headline: The President and the Hunger Strike
